title: 2015 CTC Holiday Reception in Riverside
desc: TRANSPORTATION TRANSIT: Take the train to Downtown Riverside! View the  Metrolink  or  Amtrak ?schedules. ? ? DRIVING: Free 2-hour self-parking is available in the open air lot in front of the County Administrative Center. Additional free parking is available in lots 6A and 6B located off of Lime St. and 11th St.  Click here for a parking map .  ? *** Please note that there is a fee to park in the County Administrative Center parking structure and it closes promptly at 7 p.m. Please do not park in the structure if you plan to stay at the reception past 7 p.m. ***   CANCELLATION POLICY No refunds available after Wednesday, Nov. 25.
